name: ChartPoint
description: Represents a point of a series in a chart.

properties.name: format
properties.description: Encapsulates the format properties chart point.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Returns the value of a chart point.

properties.name: dataLabel
properties.description: Returns the data label of a chart point.

properties.name: hasDataLabel
properties.description: Represents whether a data point has a data label. Not applicable for surface charts.

properties.name: markerSize
properties.description: Represents marker size of data point.

properties.name: markerStyle
properties.description: Represents marker style of a chart data point.

properties.name: markerBackgroundColor
properties.description: HTML color code representation of the marker background color of data point. E.g. #FF0000 represents Red.

properties.name: markerForegroundColor
properties.description: HTML color code representation of the marker foreground color of data point. E.g. #FF0000 represents Red.
